Train Using Cross-Validation

{% raw %} 
def softmax_RocAuc(logits, labels):
    probs = logits.softmax(-1)
    return RocAuc()(probs, labels)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
preds = torch.randn(5, 5)
labels = tensor([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]).unsqueeze(-1)
preds, labels.shape

train_cv[source]

train_cv(epochs:"Number of unfrozen epochs", lr:"Initial learning rate", frz:"Number of frozen epochs"=1, pre:"Presize"=(682, 1024), re:"Resize"=256, bs:"Batch size"=256, smooth:"Label smoothing?"=False, arch:"Architecture"='resnet18', dump:"Print model"=False, log:"Log w/ W&B"=False, save:"Save model based on RocAuc"=False, mixup:"Mixup (0.4 is good)"=0.0, tta:"Test-time augmentation"=False, fp16:"Use mixed-precision"=False, eval_dir:"Evaluate model, save results in dir"=None, val_fold:"Only do 1 fold (4 is baseline, 9 for all data)"=None, pseudo:"Path to pseudo labels to train on"=None)
